translation: Sạry tʿryf chih Allah tʿālyā sndiy khạṭr yus sarine jhann hund paln vvl chuh.
Sytthah mhrban sytthah rḥm krn vvl chuh.
(ya Allah!) asụ̄ chih chạny yạcz ʿbadt kran byyhi chihy asụ̄ cze yvt mdd mngan.
Timn lukn hnz vath yimn pytth cze anʿām frmvvuth.
Timn lukn hnz (vath) nh kynhh yimn pytth ghẓb āv krnh, th (byyhi) nah gumrahn hnz.
